text: 2.17: Snd 24.21; Mt 22.21; Ro 12.10; Fi 2.3; Hi 13.1; 1 Pi 1.22Nde tɨvir vhuuin za kha gumgir muuŋri. Nde vhɨra guigira wari won ndavir nza phorgav guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨŋri. Nde vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme rɨvɨv anan piin kɨri. Nde vhɨra tɨvir vhuuin ŋgui bakɨvi vhɨrve gari guman panan muuŋri.
